name: Space Escape (SawyerKnowles)
description:
This space-themed virtual reality puzzle game is inspired by the immersive experiences provided by physical escape rooms. Solve a series of puzzles in order to get your spaceship repaired and working before time runs out and a nearby star goes supernova!

Controls (Quest 2 - Link Cable):

 - Look around: HMD

- Move hands: Motion Controllers

- Teleport: A, X, Press Joysticks

- Snap Turn: Right Joystick

- Grab: Grip

- Menu Interact: Triggers

- Button Press: Move Hands

- Item Interact: B, Y, Triggers

Space Escape was developed by Sawyer Knowles as a project for CS4099 Directed Study in Computer Science at Michigan Technological University under the guidance of Dr. Scott Kuhl during the Spring 2022 semester.
